title: Spanish Seductions: Alonso
description: Personal and commercial relations between Raul and Raphael improve and soon Raul is able to put living on the street out of his mind. Finding Stefano rejected by his wealthy patron allows the pair to renew their truncated romance to Raul’s immense satisfaction. A chance conversation with the young Enrico convinces Raul his brutal half-brother Alonso’s cruel predilections have become more perverse. Enrico reveals that the cruel nobleman subjects Raul’s friend, Alonso’s current protégé, Jorge to painful and humiliating sexual mortification. To counter Alonso’s brutality, a cabal is formed and conspires with the nobleman’s wife, Dona Maria, to put an end to the sadist’s manipulations and degradations. The consequences of their plans provide the denouement to the fourth book in the Spanish Seductions Series.
author: Kenn Dahll
